mapper.update:
update his_medi_exit_details
pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
exit_count = #{exitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
validity_period = #{validityPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_pay = #{isPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_back = #{isBack,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
drugs_numb = #{drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drugs_name = #{drugsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drugs_alias = #{drugsAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drugs_spec = #{drugsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
exit_number = #{exitNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_number = #{recordNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
toll_number = #{tollNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medi_enter_id = #{mediEnterId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update his_medi_exit_details set pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, exit_count = #{exitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, validity_period = #{validityPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_pay = #{isPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_back = #{isBack,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, drugs_numb = #{drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drugs_name = #{drugsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drugs_alias = #{drugsAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drugs_spec = #{drugsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exit_number = #{exitNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_number = #{recordNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, toll_number = #{tollNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medi_enter_id = #{mediEnterId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into his_medi_exit_details(id, pharmacy_id, exit_count, validity_period, create_user_id, create_date, update_user_id, update_date, description, remarks, is_pay, is_back, is_del, count, total_price, drugs_numb, drugs_name, drugs_alias, drugs_spec,exit_number,record_number,toll_number,medi_enter_id) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.pharmacyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.exitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.validityPeriod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isBack,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.drugsNumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.drugsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.drugsAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.drugsSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.exitNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recordNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.tollNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mediEnterId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select:
select m.id ,e.toll_number,b.description,b.id as pharmacy_id, e.drugs_name,e.drugs_spec,e.exit_count,e.create_date,i.user_name,e.record_number,o.`name` as patient_Name,e.validity_period from his_medi_exit_details as e LEFT JOIN his_medicine_info as m on m.drugs_numb = e.drugs_numb LEFT JOIN `his-userinfo`.user_info as i on i.id = e.create_user_id LEFT JOIN his_medical_record as r on r.medical_record_id = e.record_number LEFT JOIN his_patient_info as o on o.id =r.patient_id left join his_related_medicationandexit as a on a.exit_id = e.id left join his_medication_details as b on a.medication_detail_id = b.id where e.id in (select r.exit_id from his_related_medicationandexit as r where r.medication_detail_id in
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

select d.create_date,i.user_name,sum(d.exit_count) as exit_count,d.toll_number,d.record_number from his_medi_exit_details as d LEFT JOIN `his-userinfo`.user_info as i on i.id = d.create_user_id where 1=1
and d.record_number like concat('%' #{parameter.recordNumber},'%')
and d.toll_number like concat('%' #{parameter.tollNumber},'%')
and i.user_name like concat('%' #{parameter.userName},'%')
GROUP BY d.toll_number
order by ${parameter.orders}

select m.id ,e.toll_number,b.description,b.id as pharmacy_id, e.drugs_name,e.drugs_spec,e.exit_count,e.create_date,i.user_name,e.record_number,o.`name` as patient_Name,e.validity_period from his_medi_exit_details as e LEFT JOIN his_medicine_info as m on m.drugs_numb = e.drugs_numb LEFT JOIN `his-userinfo`.user_info as i on i.id = e.create_user_id LEFT JOIN his_medical_record as r on r.medical_record_id = e.record_number LEFT JOIN his_patient_info as o on o.id =r.patient_id left join his_related_medicationandexit as a on a.exit_id = e.id left join his_medication_details as b on a.medication_detail_id = b.id where e.toll_number = #{tollNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
